content: *squares don t have to be boring with this afghan lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 80439ad skill level intermediate level 3 homespun® article #790 5 colors 8 balls total *covered bridge red black deco candy apple edwardian* crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm gauge square = 5-1/4 in 13 5 cm crochet beginning square work now proceeds in row that are worked along two edges only of the center square pattern provides two color sequences assemble strips according to written pattern crochet 8-round border to finish
